Name: Sex Adventures - The Pool Party
About the game: About the game An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a young couple experiencing their first sex party together at a very exclusive pool. Visual Novel Description It’s not easy to find an open minded partner these days, but David and Angel hit the jackpot when they found each other. Angel brags about her bisexuality constantly, while David swears he doesn’t have a drop of jealousy in his body, and doesn’t have a problem sharing her. All bark until now…since neither one of them had the chance to prove there’s more to them than empty words. Young and hot, the couple decided to settle this once and for all, and test the limits of their new relationship by going to this pool party David knew about. Hosted by a rich lady named Winter, the sex party will offer them the perfect opportunity to meet new people and unleash their deepest desires. Will their relationship survive Lady Winter’s special night of debauchery? Follow their story and find out… Features: - Over 100 HD quality renders - Animations
